data.comment: The big names in today's match at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 2, Getafe to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Getafe push upfield but Juan Martinez Munuera quickly pulls them for offside.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Betis.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Betis.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 6, In Getafe, Getafe push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 9, Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Getafe throw-in in Betis's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Betis throw-in in Getafe's half.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe take a 1-0 lead thanks to Angel Rodriguez.
Allan Nyom with an assist there.
In the minute 17, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 19, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Damian Suarez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 24, Juan Martinez Munuera awards Getafe a goal kick.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cucho Hernandez (Getafe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
William Carvalho of Betis gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 27, Getafe have a goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Betis's area.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Betis.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Getafe.
Getafe needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Getafe have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
In the minute 37, Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mathias Olivera for Getafe has been booked by Juan Martinez Munuera and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Getafe to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Goal! Marc Cucurella extends Getafe's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Cucho Hernandez to set up the goal.
In the minute 41, Betis's Marc Bartra is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Goal! Getafe extend their lead to 3-0 through Angel Rodriguez.
In the minute 42, Cucho Hernandez instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 44, In Getafe, Nabil Fekir of Betis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 45, Betis advance rapidly upfield but Juan Martinez Munuera blows for offside.
In Getafe Betis drive forward through Sergio Canales. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Juan Martinez Munuera has blown to start the second-half.
Manuel Pellegrini is making the team's first substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Borja Iglesias replacing Guido Rodriguez.
Goal kick for Betis at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 49, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Betis throw-in in Getafe's half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Betis.
William Carvalho for Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Betis to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Getafe.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Betis a goal kick.
Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Getafe's half?
In the minute 60, Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Getafe throw-in in Betis's half.
In the minute 60, Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a second substitution, with Aitor Ruibal replacing Juanmi.
Free kick Getafe.
Paul Akouokou is replacing William Carvalho for Betis at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Cucho Hernandez with Jaime Mata. This is the first substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Betis to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 64, In Getafe Betis attack through Borja Iglesias. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Getafe in the half of Betis.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Betis.
In the minute 67, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Mauro Arambarri is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Getafe.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Betis's Nabil Fekir has been booked in Getafe.
In the minute 72, Betis make their fifth substitution with Cristian Tello replacing Borja Iglesias.
Loren Moron is replacing Nabil Fekir for the away team.
Throw-in Betis.
In the minute 73, Erick Cabaco is on a sub for Damian Suarez for Getafe.
The home team replace Angel Rodriguez with David Timor.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
In the minute 74, Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Betis push forward at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez and Loren Moron gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Getafe defence.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 77, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Getafe are in shooting range from this free kick.
Paul Akouokou (Betis) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Xabier Etxeita (Getafe) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Getafe are penalized for being offside.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Betis throw-in in Getafe's half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Getafe.
In the minute 82, Aissa Mandi (Betis) has received a first yellow card.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Aissa Mandi has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Betis.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Erick Cabaco (Getafe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alex Moreno.
In the minute 86, Ante Palaversa is on a sub for Allan Nyom for Getafe.
The home team have replaced Mauro Arambarri with Francisco Portillo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
Alex Moreno is back on the pitch.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Betis's Aitor Ruibal misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
Juan Martinez Munuera will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Betis.
The match has come to a close in Getafe. The final score is 3-0.
